thread.title: SF Is Calling! Win a Once-in-a-Lifetime Trip and Shopping Spree
thread.title_full: SF Is Calling! Win a Once-in-a-Lifetime Trip and Shopping Spree

author: Victoria Pedlar
title: SF Is Calling! Win a Once-in-a-Lifetime Trip and Shopping Spree
text: SF Is Calling! Win a Once-in-a-Lifetime Trip and Shopping Spree ENTERING IS AS EASY AS 1, 2, 3: 1. Get a copy of Lisa Sugar's book, Power Your Happy . 2. Upload a picture of your book receipt: 3. Enter your email address below: Email By entering your email address, you are agreeing to the Official Rules and to receive emails from POPSUGAR and ShopStyle. The more books you buy, the more entries you get! Thank You Share With Friends NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. A PURCHASE WILL NOT INCREASE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING. OPEN TO LEGAL RESIDENTS OF THE 50 UNITED STATES. All entrants must be the age of majority in their respective state as of the date of entry and over 18 years of age. Enter For a Chance to Power Your Happy in San Francisco with POPSUGAR Founder Lisa Sugar (“the Sweepstakes”) opens at 6:00 p.m. PDT on THURSDAY, DECEMBER 8, 2016 and closes at 11:59 p.m. PDT on TUESDAY, JANUARY 17, 2016. Void where prohibited by law. Participation constitutes entrant’s full unconditional agreement and acceptance of the Official Rules , Terms of Service , and Privacy Policy . “The Sweepstakes” is sponsored by POPSUGAR Inc. (owner and operator of popsugar.com) having an address of 111 Sutter Street, 16th Floor, San Francisco, CA 94104 (collectively, the “Sponsor”). One grand prize valued at approximately $3,100. ×
